title: Melbourne comic con tomorrow
body:
im going to comic con tomorrow and and looking to build a team to try and win the 5k cash prize for 1st place if anyone is intrested add me
 ign = msi mouse pker 
 there are only 5 teams registered atm so we have good odds to take it out with a bit of luck i had a lot of maybes over the last week but i need to register the team today so i need to know asap 1st in best dressed
